summary: In World War II, a strategic Italian village agrees to surrender to the Allies only if it's allowed to organize a celebratory festival while giving aerial reconnaissance the false impression of fierce ground fighting.
cast: James Coburn|Dick Shawn|Sergio Fantoni|Giovanna Ralli|Aldo Ray|Harry Morgan|Carroll O'Connor|Leon Askin|Rico Cattani|Jay Novello|Vito Scotti|Johnny Seven|Art Lewis|William Bryant|Kurt Kreuger|Robert Carricart|Ralph Manza|Danny Francis|Herbert Ellis|Ken Wales|Eric Anderson|Ken Del Conte|Thomas Hunter|Kelly Johnson|Jerry Martin|Herb Andress|Vincent Barbi|Mushy Callahan|Noble 'Kid' Chissell|Ted Christy|Vic Christy|Mario Cimino|Giovanna Coppola|Bob Cornwell|John Cretoria|Carol Daniels|Mina Darno|Louise De Carlo|Horst Ebersberg|Carl Ekberg|Sondra Farrell|Philip Garris|Horst Graf|Raven Grey Eagle|Ivana Kislinger|James Lanphier|Emily LaRue|Joe Lo Presti|Rex Morhan|Karla Most|Richard Niles|Joe Polina|Benito Prezia|Jeanne Rainer|Cosimo Renna|Christopher Riordan|Neil Ross|Lee Stanley
title: ¿Qué hiciste en la guerra, papi?
